title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XXI, pt. 805 - Criminal History Information Reviews
content:

N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XXI, pt. 805

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§19.07, 19.09, 19.20, 19.20 -a, 19.21, 19.40, 32.02; Executive Law, §§296, 495; Civil Service

Law, §50; Corrections Law, art. 23-A; L. 2012, ch. 501

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
